# windowDidEndLiveResize(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that a live resize operation on the window has ended.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func windowDidEndLiveResize(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: A notification named [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/didEndLiveResizeNotification].

## Discussion

You can retrieve the window object in question by sending [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/object] to `notification`.

## Sizing Windows

- **windowWillResize(_:to:)**: Tells the delegate that the window is being resized (whether by the user or through one of the `setFrame...` methods other than [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/setFrame(_:display:)]).
- **windowDidResize(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the window has been resized.
- **windowWillStartLiveResize(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the window is about to be live resized.
